𒂦 𒁾𒉄𒆠 bad3-tibira baut(of)tin-work(er(s)) 𓋹 🜠 𒍐
𒂦𒁾𒉄𒆠 bad3-tibira > Patibira "Canal of the Smiths"
𒂦𒁾𒉄𒆠 bad3-tibira > Παντιβίβλος Pantibiblos
𒂦𒁾𒉄𒆠 "Wall of the Copper Worker(s)" "Fortress of the Smiths"
𒂦𒁾𒉄𒆠 Dûr-gugurrē "door-of-metal-workers" 𒂦 dūru ܕܘܪܐ door 𓉐 dwr dwell ܕ-ܘ-ܪ d-w-r > dwelling
𒂦𒁾𒉄𒆠 second city to "exercise kingship" in Sumer before the flood, following Eridu.
